EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.Singapore - 1 Week Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Tuesday, August 4th at the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop - Singapore
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop coming up next Tuesday, August 4th in Singapore. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Tuesday, August 4th, 2015 8:15am - 1:00pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/singapore>
Cliftons Singapore 108 Robinson Road Level 12 Finexis Building Singapore Maps & Directions
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Section
- VMware Player. Suggestions: VMware Player (Windows) OR VMware Fusion (MacOS). - RDP Client. Suggestions: coRD (MacOS), rDesktop (linux), Microsoft RDP (Windows)
*Access to VM instance will be provided
QUESTIONS? Contact Rushenka Perera at rperera@pivotal.io
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/singapore>
